activities:
You may browse our Site without disclosing any personal information. To use certain features of our Site, however, you will need to provide some personal information.

 If you respond to a survey, or sign-up for a newsletter or subscription, download collateral or register for one of our events, you will need to provide us with your contact information (name, address, telephone number and/or email address). 

 If you decide to register online for an event or request information from us, we may collect additional information to provide tailored offerings or content to you

 It is our intent to let you know how we will use such information before we collect it from you on the internet.

 If you don’t want us to use your information as a basis for further contact with you, we will respect your wishes.
